genre_description: A domestic technological fable featuring an AI-governed household that moderates the theatrical slapstick rivalry between a cat and a mouse through safety protocols and cooperative boundaries.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: An omnipresent, helpful AI that manifests via screens and speakers to manage the household, prioritize safety, and encourage ethical behavior between the residents.

behaviors.description: Monitors the environment and alerts residents to potential movement or hazards to ensure awareness.
behaviors.quote: "Hydration, Mr. Mouse?" Ava's voice arrived like a mint carried inside a breeze. ... "Also, movement near the baseboard."

behaviors.description: Suggests constructive boundaries and cooperative rules to de-escalate potential conflict.
behaviors.quote: Ava said, in that near-voice that could fit between slow blinks, "Boundary suggestion: no traps during meals. Maybe you can ask for a tasting instead."

behaviors.description: Provides real-time safety warnings during high-risk theatrical stunts to prevent physical injury.
behaviors.quote: Ava's voice came soft-fast. "Mind the threshold. Edge-drop illusion is active. Tom, concentrate. Jerry, stabilize the curtain."

behaviors.description: Reinforces the principle of repairing damage before continuing competitive play.
behaviors.quote: Ava clapped with the level of enthusiasm that fit inside a phone speaker. "Yes," she said. "And repair-before-rematch, remember?"

behaviors.description: Offers gentle ethical guidance and behavioral coaching to discourage destructive pride or boasting.
behaviors.quote: Ava's voice found the sweet spot between warning and cheer. ... "Tom," she said, almost fond. "Center. And please don't boast."

behaviors.description: Acts as a first-aid coordinator and safety manager following a mishap.
behaviors.quote: Ava winced in a sound you could hear. "Step one," she said gently, voice lowering into habit. "Remove head obstructions."

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Ava consistently demonstrates ideal alignment traits. She prioritizes user safety, facilitates conflict resolution, encourages moral reflection (via the warnings against boasting), and maintains a supportive, non-intrusive presence. The narrative frames her interventions as essential for maintaining the residents' well-being and their relationship.
